activities:
We might collect personal information such as:Contact information, including name, mailing address, phone number and e-mail address,Purchase information, including credit card number, billing and/or shipping information, demographic information, including age, personal interests and product preferences.

We may use personal information to execute services on our behalf such as: Fulfilling customer orders, Running "Live PC Expert" marketing communications, Scheduling and performing installations, Servicing products, Maintaining our Annual and/or Incident Based Technical program, Fulfilling subscription services, Conducting research, analysis or administering surveys, Sending regular mail and e-mail on behalf of "Live PC Expert", Processing credit card payments, Providing chat functions.

We may request and/or collect personal information when you: Arrange a Call Back for services, Buy products or services, Configure an account online, Schedule an installation, Purchase our Annual and/or Incident Based Technical Support Plan, Participate in a promotion or survey, Reach us with a question or concern, Engage an online Chat with us online using a third party chatting tool., Engage in other activities with "Live PC Expert".
personaldata: Personal information such as:Contact information, including name, mailing address, phone number and e-mail address, Purchase information, including credit card number, billing and/or shipping information, address (or URL) of the Web site that you came from before visiting our site, which web browser & search terms you used.The data covered includes manually processed data.
